description.p: scidCommunity is a community-driven fork of Scid (Shane's Chess Information Database), focused on adding enhancements while maintaining full compatibility with existing Scid databases. It allows you to store, organize, and search through large collections of chess games, with support for any Xboard or UCI compatible chess engine.

ul.li: Improved Header Search with saveable search layouts for frequently-used parameters
Engine analysis controls with configurable depth and time limits
Integrated TWIC (The Week in Chess) game downloads
Direct game uploads to Lichess and Chess.com from the PGN window
Alt+s hotkey for quick access to the Search button

description.p: This fork welcomes community suggestions and aims to be responsive to user feature requests. If you've wished for specific functionality in your chess database workflow, scidCommunity may be for you.

You can also display graphical trends, produce printable reports on players and openings, play online on FICS, and study endings with endgame tablebases. The Stockfish chess engine is included in the package.
